string.value: Mom and Dad need some help at home. I'd better go visit and see how I can help them.
I visited Mom and Dad and they looked pretty happy to see me. They need a #bMouse#k for their new computer, and heard that Mr. Spot would have one. He's in Kerning City, so I'd better get a move on.
I returned to Mom and Dad with the #bMouse#k, and they gave me #bAllowance#k. Now I can return to Mr. Spot and get a #bNexon Prepaid!#k
Hello, dear. Would you like to give Mom and Dad some help?

Music to my ears! Dad and I got a new computer, but the mouse doesn't really work that well. We heard about a man named #bMr. Spot#k, and he should have a better #bMouse#k for us to use. Go and see him, he should be in Kerning City. Thank you!
We raised you to be a little more obedient, young one. I will expect a different answer next time you come around!

Wonderful, you've got the #bMouse#k we need. I'm sure this one will work great! I know Mr. Spot probably told you about his #bNexon Prepaid#k, and I know you wanted one, so here is your #bAllowance#k.
Thanks again sweetie! Come back in a day, and I might have another chore for you...
Looks like you forgot the Mouse, dear. Be a doll and go see Mr. Spot as soon as you can.
